channel.title: Cogito on jmmv.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Cogito on jmmv.dev

item.title: Talk about Git
item.description: I've been using Git (or better said Cogito) recently as part of my PFC and, although I don't like the way Git was started, I must confess I like it a lot. In some ways it is very similar to Monotone (the version control system I prefer now) but it has its own features that make it very interesting. One of these is the difference between local and remote branches, something I'll talk about in a future post.
